snippet: Coty is seeking to raise about $700 million in its forthcoming initial public offering, a person briefed on the matter said on Tuesday. It is likely to seek to go public within the next month.
abstract: Coty is seeking to raise about $700 million in its forthcoming initial public offering, a person briefed on the matter said on Tuesday. It is likely to seek to go public within the next month.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Coty Said to Seek $700 Million in I.P.O.
